review_content: I love ASOS and allCustomer service they are just adorable
summarized_sentence: I love ASOS and their adorable customer service.
reply_message: Thank you so much for your positive review of ASOS and its customer service! We're so glad that you've had a good experience with us and we love hearing your feedback. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us!

review_content: My order was left outside and the school kids ransacked it, however this was hermes who had left it outside and ASOS refunded me and resolved my issue immediately, Mairi was so kind and helpful. 10/10 customer service.
summarized_sentence: ASOS had exemplary customer service, with an immediate refund and resolution of the issue, and Mairi was exceptionally kind and helpful.
reply_message: Thank you for your kind words and review! We strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our customers and we are glad we could help you with your order. We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and thank you for your 10/10 score. Have a great day!

summarized_sentence: The staff at this establishment is both helpful and friendly.
reply_message: Thank you for your kind words! Our staff is dedicated to providing the best possible customer service. We are glad to hear that you had such a positive experience.

review_content: Replied quickly and made sure their customers were happy
summarized_sentence: The customer reviewed positively that they replied quickly and ensured customer satisfaction.
reply_message: Thank you for your kind words! We are glad that we were able to reply to your inquiry quickly and ensure that you were happy with the results. We appreciate your feedback!

review_content: Rebecca was patient and helpful with my queries, though there seems to be some logistic issues with ASOS delivery. I've only received 1 out of the 4 parcels that were deemed to be delivered on the same day.
summarized_sentence: Rebecca provided great customer service, but there have been issues in regards to the timely delivery of ASOS shipments.
reply_message: Thank you for your generous feedback! We apologize for the logistic issues you encountered with ASOS delivery. We are sorry to hear that only 1 out of the 4 parcels have been delivered to you. We are working hard to ensure efficient deliveries to our customers and we'd like to thank you for your understanding.

review_content: Fast, kind, clear answer! Perfect that I love ASOS service
summarized_sentence: ASOS's fast, kind, and clear customer service is perfect and is loved by many.
reply_message: Thank you so much for the kind words! We are so glad that you love our ASOS service!

review_content: It took over 20 minutes to be connected with the online chat service. Upon waiting for the chat to commence, it then took 18 minutes for the customer assistant to respond with an answer to my query, which was also very unhelpful. Overall the service was poor when comparing to other online chat services.
summarized_sentence: The customer service provided by the online chat was extremely poor, taking over 38 minutes to respond with an unhelpful response.
reply_message: We apologize for the long wait and poor response to your query. We take great pride in providing excellent customer service and this experience did not reflect that. We will look into how to improve responsiveness and look forward to providing a better experience in the future. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

review_content: Terrible firm. I had such a bad time trying to get them to deliver that I won't use them again. Unfortunately I forgot to tell my wife, watching her go through the same pantomime . How does this firm stay on business ?
summarized_sentence: This company stays in business despite their terrible customer service and numerous negative experiences.
reply_message: I'm very sorry to hear about your experience with our firm. We strive to provide the best customer service possible, and your feedback helps us to identify and address areas for improvement. We appreciate the time you took to share your thoughts, and we will use this as a guide to make sure our customers have a positive experience with us in the future.

summarized_sentence: The review was highly positive, offering praise for the helpfulness, clarity and promptness of the service.
reply_message: Thank you for your kind words - we strive to provide helpful and clear support with prompt responses. We appreciate your feedback!

review_content: Ordered a Vivienne Westwood which was delivered on time but  arrived sealed but with no watch inside!  Christmas stress!  After initial frustration of trying to find a FAST way to get this resolved (ASOS no phone number and a chat box that kept disappearing unless you were like lightning on keyboard?), I liaised with Donique who resolved this quickly, re-ordering to be delivered within 4 working days.  This has minimized my delivery anxiety, as it is a present for my daughter.  Friendly and efficient service overall and providing it arrives (it was confirmed it was in stock) with watch inside(!), I will be a happy customer again. Sad state of affairs, that people (presumably at packing stage) steal, when the rest of us work hard to earn money to buy these treats. ASOS so far, so good!
summarized_sentence: After struggling to find a fast solution to their stolen item, Donique at ASOS quickly re-ordered the product and was confirmed to arrive with the watch inside, providing a friendly and efficient overall service.
reply_message: We are so sorry to hear that your order was not fulfilled as expected. We understand your frustration with not being able to get through to us and we thank you for your patience. We appreciate you taking the time to reach out to Donique and their quick and efficient service. We'll make sure that your replacement order arrives properly and on time and we thank you for your ongoing support. We understand your disappointment after all your hard work. Stealing and dishonesty are definitely not tolerated and we apologize that
